mapper.sql: SGId, Year, Place, SmCode, SmName, SmGdp
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_subgdp where year = #{0} and place=#{1}
mapper.insert:
insert into tbl_subgdp
SGId,
Year,
Place,
SmCode,
SmName,
SmGdp,
#{sgid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{smcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{smname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{smgdp,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
mapper.update:
update tbl_subgdp
Year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Place = #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SmCode = #{smcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SmName = #{smname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SmGdp = #{smgdp,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where SGId = #{sgid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tbl_subgdp set Year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Place = #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SmCode = #{smcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SmName = #{smname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SmGdp = #{smgdp,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where SGId = #{sgid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
